text: We're struggling to find child care. Every daycare is full and we found a perfect Ms. Doubtfiresque nanny but she backed out today because she got a foster child today. Any recommendations? We've been on <http://care.com|care.com>, nextdoor, and several facebook childcare groups.
its the worst :disappointed: are you looking for your own solo care nanny? or anything will do?
we're doing a nanny share with another family
we mostly used <http://care.com|care.com> but did get some referrals from nanny to nanny
ill text my wife to see if she knows anything about our former network. most of the people we referred as an emergency babysitter for a friend ended up being a fulltime nanny :angry:
<@U0GN0A9EV>: I am interviewing two women on Friday - not sure if they only want to work in the SW but I'll let you know - I only need one!
